class Solution:
    def minimumDistance(self, p: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        def maxdist(i, n):
            a = sums[n-2 if sums[-1][1] == i else -1][0] - sums[1 if sums[0][1] == i else 0][0]
            b = diffs[n-2 if diffs[-1][1] == i else -1][0] - diffs[1 if diffs[0][1] == i else 0][0]
            return max(a, b)
        
        n = len(p)
        sums = [(p[i][0] + p[i][1], i) for i in range(n)]
        diffs = [(p[i][0] - p[i][1], i) for i in range(n)]
        sums.sort()
        diffs.sort()
        print(sums)
        print(diffs)
        
        mv = float('inf')
        for i in range(n):
            mv = min(mv, maxdist(i, n))
        return mv
